alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 17 at 2:49AM CST until January 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore
